title: Khloe K's bestie arrested for DUI post car crash
text: Khloe K's bestie arrested for DUI post car crash Friday, 9 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) *Washington, Oct. 9(ANI): Khloe Kardashian's best friend Malika Haqq was recently arrested for DUI after crashing her car on an L.A. freeway.* Washington, Oct. 9(ANI): Khloe Kardashian's best friend Malika Haqq was recently arrested for DUI after crashing her car on an L.A. freeway. Law enforcement sources revealed that the crash took place around 3 a.m. and Haqq showed symptoms of intoxication, reports TMZ.com Sources further revealed that she even failed a field sobriety test and was under the influence of alcohol at the time of crash. (ANI) Khloé Kardashian's BFF Released From Jail After DUI Arrest Following Car Crash 00:40 Khloé Kardashian's BFF Malika Haqq was arrested under the suspicion that she was driving under the influence of alcohol. Haqq, the star of the E! reality show DASH Dolls, was arrested after a car crash and spent several hours behind bars. According to E! News, the 32-year-old was booked in jail at...
